text: Kaho, kya main Allah ke siwa koi aur Rubb talash karoon, halaanke wahi har cheez ka Rubb hai? Har shaks jo kuch kamaata hai uska zimmedar woh khud hai, koi bojh uthane wala dusre ka bojh nahin uthata. Phir tum sabko apne Rubb ki taraf palatna hai, us waqt woh tumhare ikhtilafat (differnces/disputes) ki haqeeat tumpar khol dega
